column1: in memory of peggy joan haynes -- gassett funeral home| first: last: peggy joan haynes august 10
column4: peggy joan; a resident of titus
column7: north carolina. she passed away on friday
column9: 2015 at the age of 81; from injuries sustained in an automobile accident. she entered heaven rejoicing with her lord and was reunited with her beloved husband of 61 years
column12: 2014. the family will receive friends tuesday
column14: 2015 from 5:00 p. m. until 7:00 p. m. at gassett funeral home. funeral services are wednesday
column16: 2015 at 11:00 a. m. at faith baptist church with rev. gerald wood officiating. interment will follow at lebanon baptist church cemetery. mrs. haynes is survived by her son
column24: carolyn brafford moore; and numerous nieces
column27: and friends. she was preceded in death by her husband; parents
column28: gus brafford and mattie mae bolton brafford; biological father
column30: june berry. flowers will be accepted or contributions are requested to faith baptist church. mrs. haynes was a dispatcher for the alabama forestry commission and the city of wetumpka police department cultivating over a decade of combined service. a love of flowers and people was evident in her over twenty-five year career as the manager of churchs florist in wetumpka.
